thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Pissed Off.
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Pissed Off.

author: Pissed Off.
title: Pissed Off.
text:
This Company is incompetent and unprofessional. The staff don't know company policies and will give you incorrect advice, despite you trying to clarify three times. They are not helpful and are unable to contact you if something has gone wrong.
Furthermore, when you give them feedback, the response is laughable! They barely address your concerns, and offer you 10% off your next rental hire. As if I'd ever go back!!
